channel.title: Project RAW | Brand New Old School | OSRS Content | 24/7 Online
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZE0eOCl.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/gcoktqv8pm9q780/Project%20Raw%20Client.jar?dl=1][COLOR=#00FFFF]DOWNLOAD CLIENT[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE] - [SIZE=5][URL=http://www.pr-forum.net][COLOR=#00FFFF]WEBSITE[/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=4]Welcome to Project Raw![/SIZE][/B]
Project Raw is a brand new server that has just been released and we're rapidly growing with lots of great features and loads of content. We're currently looking for some experienced staff members that are mature and capable for the spot! (no staffhunters).
Project Raw is PKing and Skilling based server or actually its a server for everyone, who likes skilling, pking, pvming etc.
Our current players are friendly to everyone, so that's why the community is good atm. It's nice to play a server where everyone are friendly and helpful to you! Project Raw is not the server which has the best features, but the community makes the game better!
We are offering a lot of things. Project Raw is enjoyable and fun with a great community!
Also we are 24/7 open. Website is up, but the vote system, highscores and webclient will be on as soon as possible!
Server has a has no ecomony yet, since it's fresh and young, and there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM, Skilling, PKing, Voting or Donating.
About the money making in server is pretty easy. You start with stalls, (like always). You can PvM alone or with friends, and share the drops! At the moment with low player count, PvM'ing is probably the best money making!
Why not come and test the server out?
[B]VIDEO: (Few days old)[/B]
[VIDEO]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u_yDpzVDvjQ[/VIDEO][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://209.190.33.194/images/04b/04b221f11f31f637797b9ea7142a20497b40ac28.png[/img]
-24/7 VPS -Daily Updates -OSRS Items -OSRS Gameframe and orbs -A lot of achievements -Tons of bosses to kill -FunPK -Minigames -PKP system + killstreaks -Active forums -Mature and experienced staff team -Lottery System -Prestige 5 levels -Slayer System (You can choose your task) -Double Experience every weekend -All Working 20 skills! -Perfect switching and pvp -Completionist cape -Nothing is too hard or too easy -Active owner and staff team -GWD -Custom titles
Well, thats what came in my head first, there a lot of more, come and see!
[B]MEDIA:[/B]
[SPOILER]Home [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQj6/9e0dfcb00e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQlC/63325c7482.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQne/f55820267d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQqM/2857057321.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQrN/d0f7916650.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER]Combat & PvM
[IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQzF/add5e58738.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQB4/1aba410181.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQFA/efec33a20e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQI1/8bf50c4c46.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQK7/bf155944f9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQMv/6f5690313e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQO2/29dae3e832.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQPY/49d8a0a25b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQRW/52b19ad263.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQTa/2e5f846eec.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER]Skilling and more [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQXW/1824a78de3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNQYR/b4a6e2e54f.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR0q/981a7a33e3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR21/87ad48e2ad.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR2Z/1f8e95e787.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR41/305e83b31b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR5l/71b1f2163e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR6w/61f471310d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR7G/d73e46f47a.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNR9n/df2ff6c365.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNRae/f8a088c349.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cNRbF/d85c43b67e.jpg[/img][/CENTER][/SPOILER]

Project Raw is a brand new server that has just been released and we’re rapidly growing with lots of great features and loads of content. We’re currently looking for some experienced
staff members that are mature and capable for the spot! (no staffhunters).

Project Raw is PKing and Skilling based server or actually its a server for everyone, who likes skilling, pking, pvming etc.

Our current players are friendly to everyone, so that’s why the community is good atm. It’s nice to play a server where everyone are friendly and helpful to you!
